          <title>
            <string language="en">Structure of an amorphous polymer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Struktur eines formlosen Polymer-Plastiks</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the randomly coiled chains in an amorphous polymer.</string>
